Articles.Content: Hi, Ive been playing KSP for a few months now. Purely vanilla and career mode. Ive watched the odd vid to learn how to do stuff and note much better visuals than my base game. I have a reasonably powerful watercooled PC which can run everything at ultra usually. Thus I am asking you learned lot what you would recommend to spruce up visually my game. many thanks for your suggestions. Ive noted EVE and SVE and scatterer and planetshine. Would these suffice? Ta very much old beans.

I installed SVE and EVE and module manager last eve. Looks quite nice.

I thought id installed mechjeb some time ago, but nothing ever appeared on my screen and I swiftly forgot about it. It seems module manager has fixed that.

Edited September 12, 2019 by bootsam
